iti108:2.1: “Ye keci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kuha thaddha lapa singi unnala asamahita, na me te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mamaka.
iti108:2.2: Apagata ca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imasma dhammavinaya; na ca te imasmim dhammavinaye vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjanti.
iti108:2.3: Ye ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nikkuha nillapa dhira atthaddha susamahita, te kho me, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mamaka.
iti108:2.4: Anapagata ca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imasma dhammavinaya; te ca imasmim dhammavinaye vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjanti”ti.
iti108:5.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavata, iti me sutanti.
